thread.title: Le Vrai Paris -
thread.title_full: Le Vrai Paris - Review of Novotel Suites Paris Montreuil Vincennes, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: jeff g
title: Le Vrai Paris -
text: A really friendly quirky appartment hotel. Really close to the metro. Staff extremely helpful and attentive and i just loved the lay out of the reception area with games and computer facilities. Breakfast had a fair bit of variety it was good quality and there was a lot if it if you wanted that. Local market is just outside on Saturday and Sunday well worth a scout around it. As in all cities just be mindful of who is around you - we never had any issues however. All in all a good spot for a short stay.
